# Bestow Planar Infusion III (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Witch Spells|Witch 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Planar Adventures, pg. 39

This functions as *[[Bestow Planar Infusion I (Spell)|bestow planar infusion I]],* except that the touched creature gains the greater infusion of the current plane.
